Albuquerque.Tingley Coliseum:
Tingley Coliseum is an 11,571-seat multi-purpose arena in Albuquerque, New Mexico. Originally built as a rodeo and horse show auditorium, it is located at 300 San Pedro Drive N.E.
It was home to the New Mexico Scorpions ice hockey team from 1996 to 2005 and the Albuquerque Thunderbirds of the NBA Development League from 2005 to 2010. Both teams later relocated to the Santa Ana Star Center in Rio Rancho.
